front_page_blurb: Hello esteemed predictors! The predictions league is back. Some of you may have noticed a fatal flaw of all previous iterations of the predictions league, namely my failure to provide scores. My new AI assistant Claude has come to the rescue and we have a brand new website for predictions! In these early stages there will be glitches so please be patient and screenshot your predictions for the first week incase I have a catastrophe. If you want to play I will give you a login and from there it should be self-explanatory!
